description:
Lesqua (レスカ Leska) is one of the main characters in the NG Knight Lamune & 40 series.
First appearing as Don Harumage`s "self-proclaimed" secretary and Da Cider`s partner who specializes in feather darts for personal combat. By the climax of the Hara-Hara World Arc, she is revealed to be Caféaulae Arara (アララ・カフェオレ Arara Kafeeore), the lost first princess of Arara being Milk and Cocoa`s elder sister and part of the Holy Sisters, but brainwashed along with Da Cider to be his minions. Since then during the Doki-Doki Space Arc, she and Da Cider become Lamunes`s allies and becoming a couple for the rest of the series. The blue mesh in her hair turns orange and she gains pointy elf ears like her sisters upon her brainwashing being undone.
name: Lesqua
